projects.title: AI-Powered Student Performance Predictor
projects.description: Machine learning model to predict student academic performance using historical data, attendance patterns, and learning behaviors. Built with Python and scikit-learn.
projects.longDescription: This AI system analyzes various factors affecting student performance including attendance, assignment scores, participation, and study patterns to provide early intervention recommendations for improved academic outcomes.

projects.title: Smart IoT Home Automation System
projects.description: Arduino-based home automation system with sensor integration, mobile app control, and real-time monitoring. Features temperature, light, and security controls.
projects.longDescription: An integrated IoT solution that allows users to control home appliances, monitor environmental conditions, and receive security alerts through a web interface and mobile application.

projects.title: Computer Vision Object Detection App
projects.description: Real-time object detection application using deep learning models. Capable of identifying and tracking multiple objects in video streams with high accuracy.
projects.longDescription: A computer vision application that uses pre-trained neural networks to detect and classify objects in real-time. Includes features for custom model training and performance optimization.

projects.title: Full-Stack E-Learning Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive online learning platform with course management, video streaming, quizzes, and progress tracking. Built for educational institutions.
projects.longDescription: A complete e-learning solution featuring course creation tools, student enrollment, video lectures, interactive quizzes, assignment submissions, and detailed analytics for educators.

projects.title: Data Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive data visualization dashboard for analyzing large datasets with charts, graphs, and statistical insights. Built for business intelligence and reporting.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive analytics platform that processes and visualizes complex datasets, providing interactive charts, statistical analysis, and automated report generation for data-driven decision making.

projects.title: Chatbot with Natural Language Processing
projects.description: AI-powered chatbot using NLP techniques for customer service automation. Features intent recognition, entity extraction, and contextual responses.
projects.longDescription: An intelligent chatbot system that understands natural language queries and provides contextual responses. Includes machine learning models for intent classification and sentiment analysis.

projects.title: Blockchain-based Voting System
projects.description: Secure digital voting platform using blockchain technology to ensure transparency, immutability, and voter privacy in electoral processes.
projects.longDescription: A decentralized voting system that leverages blockchain technology to create tamper-proof elections with complete transparency while maintaining voter anonymity and security.

projects.title: Smart Campus Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive campus management solution with student information system, attendance tracking, resource booking, and academic performance monitoring.
projects.longDescription: An integrated campus management platform designed for educational institutions, featuring student and faculty management, course scheduling, resource allocation, and comprehensive analytics.
